casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. CARR
v.
DAYTON POLICE DEPT. 2018-1631 Supreme Court of Ohio. January 23, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

Kennedy, French, DeWine, and Stewart, JJ., concur. O'Connor, C.J., and Fischer and Donnelly, JJ., dissent.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. Sua sponte, alternative writ granted. The following briefing schedule is set for presentation of evidence and filing of briefs pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.05: The parties shall file any evidence they intend to present within 20 days, relator shall file a brief within 10 days after the filing of the evidence, respondent shall file a brief within 20 days after the filing of relator's brief, and relator may file a reply brief within 7 days after the filing of respondent's brief.
